DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hope establish whether diode laser , longer-wavelength laser , effective treat keratosis pilaris , hopefully open door discussion management skin condition . The primary outcome interest difference overall blind rater severity score treat versus untreated site . The secondary outcome interest change patient 's self-rated severity score treat site . To account potential natural disease progression regression , investigator also compare patient mean change mean change severity score untreated site .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Keratosis Pilaris With 810 nm Diode Laser
